10-18.title: AN OPEN MIND
10-18.quote: True humility and an open mind can lead us to faith, . . .
10-18.source: TWELVE STEPS AND TWELVE TRADITIONS, p. 33
content: My alcoholic thinking led me to believe that I could control my drinking, but I couldn't. When I came to A.A., I realized that God was speaking to me through my group. My mind was open just enough to know that I needed His help. A real, honest acceptance of A.A. took more time, but with it came humility. I know how insane I was, and I am extremely grateful to have my sanity restored to me and to be a sober alcoholic. The new, sober me is a much better person than I ever could have been without A.A.
